title.rendered: Roo Systems Australia ECU Tuning – Volkswagen Amarok

content.rendered:
***MUST BE INSTALLED AT OUR COFFS HARBOUR WORKSHOP***

Roo Systems Australia ECU Tuning for your Volkswagen Amarok matched with a Roo Systems mandrel bent 409 stainless steel exhaust is designed to produce an increase in power, torque and improve fuel efficiency to allow better drivability.

RSA has spent thousands of hours testing and tuning our products and invested a lot of resources on research and development. Our products are constantly being tested in the bush, on the beach, as well as towing both caravans & camper trailers. There are NO companies that test their products as extensively as we do!

The benefits of having a Roo System tune and exhaust upgrade include ease of overtaking and maintaining comfortable cruising speeds, and more power when you are driving off-road. And if you’re fully loaded or towing, you can comfortably maintain the legal road speed and you won’t find yourself slowing down on long hills with a line of motorist backed up behind you!

If you want a specific tune for towing RSA will tailor that to allow responsiveness of your vehicle to make it easier and more drivable.

Please note this is for Stage 1 – tune only.

 

Please note this is for Stage 1 – ECU tune only.
For exhaust and/or intercooler please call 02 6699 2744 or vehicle specific quote.
Roo Systems Australia ECU Tuning – Volkswagen Amarok

excerpt.rendered:
ROO SYSTEMS CUSTOM ECU REMAPS

Are you Towing or Touring or just wanting more from your 4×4?

Roo Systems aim is to gain more power, more torque, better fuel economy from our customer’s vehicle to maximise their driver experience.
